title: Download Speeds

embed.description: Test your mobile network speed, wherever you may be. Download the free Ookla Speedtest app for iOS, Amazon, Android or Windows Phone.

body: Im trying to download league but I'm only getting around 400kb/s. Everything else is fine. Is this an issue on riots end or do I need to update my network settings? I have google fiber and my wireless card in my mac tops out around 350Mb/s.

replies.body: Your network settings could certainly be causing some issues in reaching the patching servers, or even the speed your hard drive is updating it all.  I don't recommend making any adjustments right now, because cancelling it out may cause delays while it scans your already saved files for any corruption.  When you do get a chance, try the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  I hope that helps!
Please, It's giving me an estimated download time of like 400min
